Pinot Noir

This is a rundown of the Winelist for Duke's Beachhouse Maui. It's a work-in-progress so please be forgiving!

View On GitHub

    Pinot Noir

    Rundown

    • Big 4
      • Medium Body
      • Medium-High Fruit
        • Very red-fruited (cherry and cranberry) often with appealing vegetable notes of beets or mushrooms
      • Medium to Low Tannins
      • Medium-High Acidity
    • Subgroups
